I will definitely recommend her to everyone. No second thoughts. Perfect doctor with so much of experience and knowledge. Very very happy . Thankyou so much priyanka mam .

i jad problem in conceiving , she treated me very well and due to her counselling i have been a mother , she supported me like a friend

review: Dr. Priyanka Suhag is an incredible gynecologist with a warm and friendly demeanor. She makes me feel comfortable and valued, creating a safe space to discuss intimate concerns. Her problem-solving skills are impressive; she listens carefully and provides effective solutions tailored to individual needs. Dr. Suhag's suggestions for my health are practical and empowering, guiding  me  towards a happier and healthier life.
*** ** *** **** **** ****** **** *** * *** , she patiencely listen to my problems and given me the right direction  and have the deep conversation about my procedure

Doctor Priyanka is an exceptionally informed doc. She gives you proper time and will listens to all your queries patiently and then only will provide you a detailed consult. My mother has visited her for consultations and she found her really good.
